metadata.synopsis: Companion going on the stage branch of the WYR_Circus_Clown_PreShow dialog, which was cut to this separate dialog for the better cine maintenance. After the player picks a companion in the original dialog this one starts, where we see companion climbing on the stage and after a short line from Dribbles his beast attacks the character.
